casebody.data:
Argued and submitted June 8, affirmed July 7, 2010 Dominika LUKA, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. TRI-COUNTY METROPOLITAN TRANSPORTATION DISTRICT OF OREGON, a municipal corporation, Defendant-Respondent.

Multnomah County Circuit Court

081115880; A141388 234 P3d 1097 Elena E. Tsiprin argued the cause for appellant. With her on the briefs was Law Offices of Elena E. Tsiprin. Before Haselton, Presiding Judge, and Armstrong, Judge, and Duncan, Judge. PER CURIAM

Erik Van Hagen argued the cause and filed the brief for respondent.
